job_history.work_description: Supervised and evaluated certified and non-certified staff. Implemented a pilot program from the MCEE for a new staff evaluation model. Supervised general and special education teachers and maintained accountability for meeting legal expectations for students with an IEP, 504, Title I services, or at-risk services.

Evaluated certified and non-certified staff. Supervised multiple extra-curricular activities for middle school students. Assisted in planning and implementing transition activities for blending fifth and sixth grade teachers, students, and families to the middle school.
K-12 Career Preparation Coordinator. Coordinator of HS At-Risk Programming. Freshmen Class Advisor.
School Improvement Team Committee Chairperson. OEA Negotiating Team member.

interests: Advanced Math 7 and Algebra I added to MS Curriculum
HCMS participates in American Heart Association's Red Out Game
Additional Clubs added at middle school: Football, Lacrosse, and Competitive Cheerleading

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Served as a Middle School Principal and Assistant Middle School Principal, demonstrating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Staff Evaluation and Supervision
skills.explanation: Evaluated and supervised certified and non-certified staff in multiple roles, indicating expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Program Development and Implementation
skills.explanation: Implemented a pilot program for staff evaluation and coordinated various activities, showing strong proficiency in program development and implementation.

skills.name: Accountability and Compliance
skills.explanation: Maintained accountability for meeting legal expectations for students with special needs, indicating strong proficiency in ensuring compliance.

skills.name: Communication and Collaboration
skills.explanation: Worked with teachers, staff, and families to plan and implement transition activities, demonstrating strong proficiency in communication and collaboration.

skills.name: Curriculum Development
skills.explanation: Added Advanced Math 7 and Algebra I to the middle school curriculum, showing a solid working proficiency in curriculum development.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Coordinated various projects and activities, such as Lego Robotics and Girls on the Run, indicating a solid working proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Teaching and Education
skills.explanation: Taught high school language arts and served as a K-12 Career Preparation Coordinator, showing strong proficiency in teaching and education.
